Good for America "I can appreciate the fact that Mike Pence 's unyielding right-wing voting record on literally every issue is appreciated by the far-right," The Washington Monthly's liberal Steve Benen says. But to say that the guy isn't ready for prime time is a dramatic understatement. Mike Pence has no areas of expertise, has no major pieces of legislation to his name, has demonstrated no working understanding of any area of public policy, and after spending five minutes watching him speak on any subject, it becomes clear that he's conspicuously unintelligent. On the official Google blog Eric Schmidt wrote that he, Page and co-founder Sergey Brin had decided it was time to make some structural changes to the company. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, wrote Eric Schmidt . He further discussed their roles, saying that Page would lead product development and technology strategy along with becoming the company's CEO. German Economy Minister Karl-Theodor zu Guttenberg met with Sergio Marchionne .[ Karl-Theodor zu Guttenberg , German Economy Minister]: I must say, it's an interesting approach, without question, one with a considerable amount of financing. Fiat's known for its small cars- but it also owns other brands including Ferrari and Maserati. Sergio Marchionne says Fiat needs to increase its output to about six million vehicles a year to survive the financial crisis.
